data.title: Sorting Strings by different chars
data.statement: You are given a list of strings. Your task is to sort these strings in descending order based on the number of unique characters in each string. If two strings have the same number of unique characters, their order should remain the same as in the original list.

testCases.title: Common test 2
testCases.testIn: hello hi cat dog bird snake frog tiger lion elephant
testCases.testOut: elephant snake tiger hello bird frog lion cat dog hi

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testIn: eleven orange banana grape apple melon potato carrot zebra lion rabbit tiger
testCases.testOut: orange grape melon carrot zebra rabbit tiger eleven apple potato lion banana

testCases.title: Validator 6
testCases.testIn: supercalifragilisticexpialidocious hippopotamus antidisestablishmentarianism pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis floccinaucinihilipilification encyclopedia pseudopseudohypoparathyroidism honorificabilitudinitatibus
testCases.testOut: supercalifragilisticexpialidocious pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis honorificabilitudinitatibus pseudopseudohypoparathyroidism antidisestablishmentarianism floccinaucinihilipilification encyclopedia hippopotamus

data.constraints: Each string in the input consists of lowercase English letters only.
data.outputDescription: Output the strings sorted in descending order by the number of unique characters, separated by spaces.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are given a list of strings. Your task is to sort these strings in descending order based on the number of unique characters in each string. If two strings have the same number of unique characters, their order should remain the same as in the original list.
Input
Line 1: String of space-separated words.
Output
Output the strings sorted in descending order by the number of unique characters, separated by spaces.
Constraints
Each string in the input consists of lowercase English letters only.
Example
Input
banana apple orange strawberry melon
Output
strawberry orange melon apple banana
